note: Human Rights Lawyer • Author • Dad Jokes • Host of The Qasim Rashid Show on Sirius XM • Substack Creator of “Let’s Address This”

Artist working in many different styles and mediums. I paint what is in the moment with what I have on hand. the dominant paradigm is what was once the avant-garde. Now the art world is oversaturated with abstract, ready made and conceptual art.

I love to make art for the love of art not some jumped up linguistic nonsense. I love brushwork, color and ideas but prefer to create things that don't require three phd's to interpret.

52. Cat dad. Joyfully married.

I mostly post about #DinkeyCreek, the #Sierra, #Monterey, #beavers, #forests, and #meadows. Quite fond of #motorcycles, #scuba diving, #nudibranchs, #hiking, 4x4ing/rock crawling, seeing new places, #AmateurRadio, retro technology, #trains, and cats.

Photography / Digital Art fanatic … my images are based on my own photography (not from stock or "public domain") … or I create them freehand from my imagination or observation.   For my digital paintings, I love using #CorelPainter or #Rebelle … and of course there are usually some tweaks in #Photoshop. I don’t use artificial Intelligence programs. #NotAi   Come visit me at my main website, here: https://lois-bryan.pixels.com    #HumanMadeArt

I shoot what catches my eye and gravitate towards black and white renditions.

Photos and edits are mine, AI free and have a CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 license. My images are shot with either a compact four thirds or a full frame camera.

I do prune my content on a semi-regular basis......

Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.
